dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kazakhstan's Minister of Education, Gani Beisembayev, just announced they're updating school textbooks after public complaints.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazakhstan's Minister of Education, Gani Beisembayev, just announced they're updating school textbooks after public complaints.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: School textbooks in Kazakhstan will be updated following public complaints about their content, Minister of Education Gani Beisembayev said at a government briefing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I saw some of those confusing exercises online! People with, like, higher education couldn't even solve them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I saw some of those confusing exercises online! People with, like, higher education couldn't even solve them.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sometimes you see exercises on the internet that even people with higher education struggle to solve.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And he said out of 600 textbooks, only 26 had complaints, and just 11 of those were actually confirmed.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And he said out of six hundred textbooks, only twenty six had complaints, and just eleven of those were actually confirmed.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We conducted a full analysis and found that out of 600 titles, concerns were raised about 26 textbooks, and only 11 of those complaints were confirmed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's a pretty small number, honestly. But still, uh, which subjects are getting the most flak?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a pretty small number, honestly. But still, uh, which subjects are getting the most flak?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Mostly geography, Kazakh language and literature, and Russian language and literature. A few math issues in the early grades too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mostly geography, Kazakh language and literature, and Russian language and literature. A few math issues in the early grades too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Most of the issues relate to repeated subjects " geography, Kazakh language and literature, Russian language and literature. Primarily three subjects, and to a lesser extent, mathematics in the early grades," Beisembayev said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So the new national standard in 2026 will include all that feedback, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So the new national standard in twenty twenty six will include all that feedback, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The minister noted that a new national educational standard will take effect in 2026, and it will incorporate feedback from the public.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yep, he said they're taking the errors into account for the new editions. It's a big step for transparency.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yep, he said they're taking the errors into account for the new editions. It's a big step for transparency.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He added that errors identified in the current materials will be taken into account during the development of the new textbooks.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Good. 'Cause some of those exercises were just... baffling. Like, who comes up with these things?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Good. 'Cause some of those exercises were just... baffling. Like, who comes up with these things?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right? But at least they're listening now. Public pressure does work sometimes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? But at least they're listening now. Public pressure does work sometimes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Hopefully the updated versions are way clearer. Kids don't need that extra confusion.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Hopefully the updated versions are way clearer. Kids don't need that extra confusion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And starting in 2026, we might see a real improvement.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And starting in twenty twenty six, we might see a real improvement.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The minister noted that a new national educational standard will take effect in 2026, and it will incorporate feedback from the public.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Fingers crossed. Education reform is always a slow process, but this seems like a positive move.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fingers crossed. Education reform is always a slow process, but this seems like a positive move.
